nodes.text: An alacrity implant was a type of cybernetic device that was specifically used to enhance the nervous system of the being within which it was installed. This resulted in significantly-improved reaction times within the subject, however the invasive nature of the implant required them to be healthier than the norm.
Within the game, the player character, or any in the party, must have a constitution attribute of 14 or higher in order to equip this device.
